HowToUse1: If you want to play with (a) specific language(s) only, set UseAllLanguages to false and remove all other language codes from the LanguagePool list.
HowToUse2: If UseAllLanguages is set to true, the module will ignore the LanguagePool list and instead pick any language.
HowToUse3: Set LanguagesWithManualOnly to true if you only want the module to select languages that have a dedicated manual available in that language.
